nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
  latest(network) AS 'Network Name',
  latest(network_id) AS 'Network ID',
  latest(org_name) AS 'Parent Organization',
  latest(org_id) AS 'Parent Organization ID',
  latest(tags.container_service) AS 'Network Agent',
  latest(timestamp) AS 'Last Update'
WHERE instrumentation.name = 'meraki.network'
AND entity.guid = {{entity.id}}

FROM Metric SELECT
  latest(kentik.meraki.uplink_status.Status)
FACET uplink_name, status
WHERE network_id IN (
  FROM Metric SELECT
    network_id
  WHERE instrumentation.name = 'meraki.network'
  AND entity.guid = {{entity.id}}
)

FROM Metric SELECT
  uniqueCount(serial) AS 'Total Devices',
  filter(uniqueCount(serial), WHERE status != 'online') AS 'Problem Devices',
  ((filter(uniqueCount(serial), WHERE status = 'online')) / uniqueCount(serial))*100 AS '% Online'
WHERE metricName = 'kentik.meraki.device_status.Status'
AND network_id IN (
  FROM Metric SELECT
    network_id
  WHERE instrumentation.name = 'meraki.network'
  AND entity.guid = {{entity.id}}
)
COMPARE WITH 1 DAY AGO

FROM Metric SELECT
  uniqueCount(wan1,wan2) AS 'Total VPNs',
  filter(uniqueCount(wan1,wan2), WHERE status != 'online') AS 'Problem VPNs',
  ((filter(uniqueCount(wan1,wan2), WHERE status = 'online')) / uniqueCount(wan1,wan2))*100 AS '% Online'
WHERE metricName = 'kentik.meraki.vpn_status.Status'
AND network_id IN (
  FROM Metric SELECT
    network_id
  WHERE instrumentation.name = 'meraki.network'
  AND entity.guid = {{entity.id}}
)
COMPARE WITH 1 DAY AGO

FROM Metric SELECT
  latest(kentik.meraki.device_status.Status) AS 'Status Code'
FACET
  device_name AS 'Device',
  model AS 'Model',
  product_type AS 'Type',
  serial AS 'Serial',
  status AS 'Status'
WHERE network_id IN (
  FROM Metric SELECT
    network_id
  WHERE instrumentation.name = 'meraki.network'
  AND entity.guid = {{entity.id}}
)
LIMIT 1000

FROM Metric SELECT
  latest(kentik.meraki.vpn_status.Status) AS 'Status Code'
FACET
  device_name AS 'Device',
  serial AS 'Serial',
  vpn_mode AS 'VPN Mode',
  status AS 'Status',
  wan1 AS 'WAN 1',
  wan2 AS 'WAN 2'
WHERE network_id IN (
  FROM Metric SELECT
    network_id
  WHERE instrumentation.name = 'meraki.network'
  AND entity.guid = {{entity.id}}
)
LIMIT 1000
